modName: SkyDream Mer-Maids with Healer and Body Changer
summary:
5 Elven Followers with HEALER. Marriageable, with deep stories.
With In-Game Body Changer, VAMPIRE & WEREWOLF Options, and Single ESP download. Easily switch between options/bodies in game (including BBP versions) in each All-in-One.
10 Body Types: CBBE,UNP,CBBE BBP,7Base BBP,UNPBlessed BBP,ADEC BBP,DreamGirl,CBBE Slim,CBPE,UNP Slim
descriptionHtml:
[heading][center][color=#1E90FF][size=18]SkyDream Mer-Maids[/size][/color]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/54493-1-1401512254.jpg[/img]
SkyDream Mer-Maids are Standalone Followers, including [color=#CD853F][i]Vampire and Werewolf Options[/i][/color], and also has a [color=#CD853F][i]Healer Follower[/i][/color].
All Followers are Marriageable and Essential, and will level with the Player (at 80-85%) up to a maximum level of 150. They are based off of the beautiful [i]Mer (Elf races like Altmer, Bosmer, Dunmer, Orsimer)[/i] characters and stories created by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/58268/?]Farvat[/url].

Each girl has a very deep and detailed backstory, contained in books with pictures from Farvat's stories.

[color=#CD853F][size=5][i]Including an In-Game Body Changer[/i] [/size]
[size=4]Easily switch between Multiple Body Types, Vampire Option, Hair Styles and Tattoo Options for each follower. [/size]
'Manage Outfit' Option (Change her default outfit without using a separate Follower Extender).
Options are Normal Outfit / Clothes Outfit / No Outfit.
Summon any follower back to you, anywhere in Skyrim. Each Follower preset has their own unique inventory.
[size=4]10 Body Options:[/size][/color]
CBBE / UNP Standard package
CBBE BBP / SeveNBase BombShell BBP package
ADEC BBP / UNP Blessed BBP package
CBBE Slim / Dream Girl package
CBPE / UNP Slim[/center]

[color=#1E90FF][size=5][i]Healer Qulshiya:[/i][/size][/color][/heading]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/54493-1-1405666815.jpg[/img]
Qulshiya is a former Vigilant of Stendarr and healer. Not only will she heal you and herself, you can choose to have her also heal up to 4 followers (including herself), by talking to her. She does heal both normal and vampire followers. She will also cast 'Turn Undead' in battle.

She also has a Major Healing dialog option, and will completely heal the player, cure all diseases, and fortify health for 10 minutes. Since that amount of healing takes a lot of energy from Qulshiya, she can only cast it outside of combat once per day (24 hours).

[color=#CD853F][b]She has 5 Healing Options for Combat: [/b][/color]Heal Only You and Fight, Heal You without Fighting, Heal Your Entire Party and Fight, Heal Your Entire Party without Fighting, and Fight as a Normal Follower.

[center]Great Showcase Video by Hodilton
[youtube]wXl3h97Mf0Y[/youtube][/center]

[heading][color=#1E90FF][size=5][i]General Features:[/i][/size][/color][/heading]
Each Girl has carries a book, that contains a very rich and interesting personal backstory with Images. Find out their past, and how each girl is connected to each other, and the rest of the Skyrim world!

All Followers are [b]Marriageable and Essential, and have Vampire Options[/b], and will level with the Player (at 80-85%) up to a maximum level of 150.

[b]10 Body Options:[/b] CBBE, UNP, CBBE BBP, SeveNBase BBP, UNP Blessed BBP, ADEC BBP, Dream Girl, CBBE Slim, CBPE, UNP Slim

Also choose: 2 Hair Options, and With / Without the Tattoos

Each girl has custom outfits, which are playable if you use AFT / EFF / UFO to change their default outfits.

[b]They can be found throughout Skyrim:
- Avialsis is at the Solitude Bards College
- Sindhil is at the Old Hroldan Inn
- Dralhana is at the Windhelm White Phial
- Rahyla is at NightGate Inn
- Qulshiya (healer) is at Dawnstar The White Hall [/b]

[color=RED][b] Rahyla does not have a vampire option.[/b][/color]

[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/54493-1-1404190414.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/54493-3-1404190414.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/54493-5-1404190414.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/54493-4-1404190414.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/54493-2-1404190414.jpg[/img][/center]


[heading][color=#1E90FF][size=5]In-Game Body Changer:[/size][/color][/heading]
Easily switch between all of the different options in game, with both UNP and CBBE based bodies in an All-in-One ESP. There are also BBP versions. You can enable and disable each one independently. Also choose between Hair Options, Vampire Options, and Tattoo Options.

A magic spell in game makes it possible to switch between these options. You will automatically learn the spell when you read any of the Books each follower carries, and can also learn it by talking with Qulshiya. It will allow you to pick and choose all of the options for each girl you want.

[b]'Manage Outfit' option[/b], under Extra Options of the Body Changer Spell. It will allow you to change her default outfit without using a separate Follower Extender.
Options are Normal Outfit / Clothes Outfit / No Outfit.

[b]Divorce option[/b], under Extra Options of the Body Changer Spell. This will restart the marriage quest for anyone you are married to.

[i]Also, you can use the spell to transport any missing follower back to you, if you lose them, anywhere in Skyrim.[/i]

[color=E8A317]*Each follower preset is also able to keep her own inventory, separate from the other presets, if you want.[/color]


[heading][color=#1E90FF][size=5][i]Installation:[/i][/size][/color][/heading]
[color=#1E90FF][b]For Standard UNP/CBBE and Slim CBBE/DreamGirl Users: [/b][/color]
This is a STANDALONE follower mod! No other mods required. Simply download by using the Nexus Mod Manager. You can select in game the body and version of each girl you want.

[color=#1E90FF][b]For All BBP Versions: [/b][/color]
1) [color=red]NOTE:[/color] To run any BBP-Body version Mod properly, you have to install a skeleton which supports BBP or TBBP such as XP32's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800/?//]XP32 Maximum Skeleton[/url], which is what we have used. If not you'll get a crash at startup. There are several skeleton/animation/package options out there to choose from.
2) Download and activate the mod through the Nexus Mod Manager

*Compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037/?/]Ultimate Follower Overhaul (UFO)[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524/?/]Amazing Follower Tweaks (AFT)[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933//?]Extensible Follower Framework (EFF)[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554/?/]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible by navetsea[/url]


[heading][color=#1E90FF][size=5][i]Frequently Asked Questions:[/i][/size][/color][/heading]

[b]Where can I find the followers?[/b]
Avialsis is at the Solitude Bards College, Sindhil is at the Old Hroldan Inn, Dralhana is at the Windhelm White Phial, Rahyla is at NightGate Inn, and Qulshiya is at Dawnstar The White Hall

[b]I want to change a girl to another body type or option?[/b]
Make sure to dismiss the current follower version you are using, then use the In-Game Body Changer spell to select another version.

[b]Who has vampire options?[/b]
Avialsis, Dralhana, and Sindhil have vampire options. We decide not to have vampire options for Qulshiya as it goes against her backstory, and Rahyla (being an orc) would not show much of a visual difference.

[b]Can I marry her?[/b]
YES. The Marriage Quest can also be reset under Extra Options if needed.

[b]Where is the In-Game Body Changer?[/b]
You will automatically learn the spell when you read any of the Books each follower carries. You can also learn it by talking with Qulshiya.

[b]How do I make her turn into a werewolf?[/b]
The followers will use the typical game mechanics to turn NPC followers to werewolves. They are also compatible with other mods that add the Werewolf infection/turn options to the followers, like Werewolf followers by Brevi

[heading][color=#1E90FF][size=5][i]Credits and Permissions :[/i][/size][/color][/heading]
Thank you to Farvat for allowing us to convert such beautiful characters, and to help add to the stories you create. It is always a joy to work with someone who can create such great work. And, as always, these mods would never turn out as great without VRDaphni working with me. :)
Also, Thank you to the following people who helped do final beta testing: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/3743885]ff7legend[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/5360970/?]pringles89[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/4294085/?]softail4life[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/3447031/?]QueenieAngel[/url], and of course Farvat and VRDaphni.

files.fileName: SkyDream Mer-Maids - ADEC BBP - UNPB Blessed BBP-54493-1-51.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Added Vampire Versions of Qulshiya.
Qulshiya will now also heal Vampire Followers.
Custom standalone spells added, to ensure other mods do not interfere with effects.
Qulshiya Grand Healing radius increased.
Sindhil can now be married.

Optional File added to overwrite the custom eyes with the standard vampire eyes from the DawnGuard DLC.

files.name: SkyDream Mer-Maids - CBBE BBP - SeveNBase UNP Bombshell BBP
files.fileName: SkyDream Maidens - CBBE BBP - SeveNBase UNP Bombshell BBP-54493-1-52.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Updates to have Qulshiya heal radius work better.
Qulshiya will no longer wander, when told to wait or after being dismissed.
Qulshiya will no longer cast healing spells when waiting.
Qulshiya's Grand Healing will only cast on followers and the player, and not neutral people.

files.name: SkyDream Mer-Maids - ADEC BBP - UNPB Blessed BBP
files.fileName: SkyDream Mer-Maids - ADEC BBP - UNPB Blessed BBP-54493-1-53.7z
files.changelogHtml:
- Qulshiya's Summanable's issue fixed
- Updated ESP, Script and SEQ

- Qulshiya now has a quest reset option in the body changer spell under "extra options". When you update from 1.52 to 1.60 you don't need a clean save, if you do not see the healing dialogue options just run Qulshiya's Reset Quest via body changer spell.
